classScheduleInformation: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, may be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment in the MFA program in graphic design or consent of departmental graduate committee.
description: Individually directed research in the studio with concentration in design. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. May be repeated to a maximum of 20 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment in the MFA program in graphic design or consent of departmental graduate committee.
label: Design Laboratory
